writer.name: 内德利科·德拉季奇 Nedeljko Dragic

director.name: 内德利科·德拉季奇 Nedeljko Dragic

introduction: A man stares resignedly from behind the bars of a small window on a large wall. At the foot of the wall is a red flower. The prisoner keeps looking at it and would like to touch the-for him-unreachable flower. And so the years pass by ...One spring the prisoner Is set free. No longer paying any attention to the flower, hegoes out into the world.The crushed flower is left behind him.A prisoner stares sadly into a courtyard from behind the bars of his cell's small window. As the year go by, the growth a single red flower gives him hope. Directed by Nedeljko Dragic.1966 Diploma, Venice1971 Award for Exceptional Merit, Philadelphia
